name: A Circle Among Squares
description:
You're a circle. You're the good guy. But you're surrounded by squares. Some are irrelevant. Others are useful and/or annoying. Then there are the black squares. They want you to Retry. They will shoot or even try to touch you. They are the bad guys. Be a good guy and pulverize those baddies, will you?

Survive and shoot all enemies in 200 levels. Each level won unblocks the next level permanently (autosave). Enemies come in a variety of black squares and action patterns, while squares of other colors do a multitude of things, ranging from reflecting bullets to teleporting you. Enemies are vanquished with a single hit, and so do you. Failing a level has no consequences. While the first levels are easy and often, very quick, difficulty increases greatly in later levels.

Game Elements



This is you. You shoot in the same direction the arrow is facing.


This is the floor. Anyone can move freely above those squares.


This is the bullet you shoot.


This is an enemy. It shoots in the same direction the rectangle is.


This is an enemy. It shoots in 4 directions simultaneously.


This is the bullet enemies shoot.


This is an enemy. If it touches you, you lose. Doesn't shoot.


This is a block. Nothing can pass or destroy it.


This a reflective block. Nothing can pass it and bullets are reflected.


This is a selective block. Only enemy bullets can pass it.


This is a selective block. Only bullets coming from the same direction of the arrow can pass it. Has 4 variations.


This is a reflective/deflective block. Depending on the direction of the bullet, it may turn 90º or be reflected. Has 4 variations.


This is a teleportation square. It always comes in a single pair and only you can step over it.


This is a hole. It blocks movement but not bullets.

Features


  • 200 Levels
  • 3 Types of Enemies
  • Enemies may be static, move in predetermined routes, follow or flee you or a combination of both
  • Block, reflection, deflection and teleport elements
  • Autosave
  • Minimalist design - After a single button press and virtually no loading time, you're in the last unblocked level
  • Game Walkthrough inside game files - video
  • 100 Achievements, 1 for each 2 Levels won
  • Xbox Controller Support

Keyboard Controls


There's no mouse support.

  • Start/Confirm/Shoot: Space/Enter
  • Move: Up/Left/Down/Right, W/A/S/D, Numpad 8/4/2/6
  • Start/Exit: Esc
  • Raise sound volume: Tab
  • Lower sound volume: Shift

Xbox Controller Controls


  • Start/Confirm/Shoot: A
  • Start/Exit: Select
  • Raise sound volume: RB
  • Lower sound volume: LB
